name: Robert SPRUILL, Appellant, v. Edward KLEM, Superintendent, Richard Spaid, Unit Manager, and Gloria Burda, Record Supervisor, Pennsylvania's Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Robert SPRUILL, Appellant, v. Edward KLEM, Superintendent, Richard Spaid, Unit Manager, and Gloria Burda, Record Supervisor, Pennsylvania's Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
912 A.2d 205
Robert SPRUILL, Appellant, v. Edward KLEM, Superintendent, Richard Spaid, Unit Manager, and Gloria Burda, Record Supervisor, Pennsylvania's Department of Corrections, Appellees.
